name: meme

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The MEME Suite allows the biologist to discover novel motifs in
collections of unaligned nucleotide or protein sequences, and to perform
a wide variety of other motif-based analyses.

dependencies.name: ghostscript
dependencies.description: An interpreter for the PostScript language and for PDF.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: imagemagick
dependencies.description:
ImageMagick is a software suite to create, edit, compose, or convert
bitmap images.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: libxslt
dependencies.description:
Libxslt is the XSLT C library developed for the GNOME project. XSLT
itself is a an XML language to define transformation for XML. Libxslt is
based on libxml2 the XML C library developed for the GNOME project. It
also implements most of the EXSLT set of processor-portable extensions
functions and some of Saxon's evaluate and expressions extensions.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-xml-parser
dependencies.description: XML::Parser - A perl module for parsing XML documents

dependencies.name: perl-xml-simple
dependencies.description: An API for simple XML files

dependencies.name: zlib-ng
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.

dependent_to.name: chexmix
dependent_to.description:
ChExMix: the ChIP-exo mixture model. ChExMix aims to characterize
protein-DNA binding subtypes in ChIP-exo experiments.
